thread.title: best customer service ever
thread.title_full: best customer service ever - Review of Hampton Inn & Suites San Francisco-Burlingame-Airport South, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: LaurisMoli
title: best customer service ever
text: All i have to say is THANK YOU CHRISTIENNE GARCIA, you were an angel for us during our first terrible hours in San Francisco, thank you for trying so hard to help us and being such a good human being. i wish all companies had people like you working for them, you are an example of excellent customer service !!!! Thank you.
